alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 5:46PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Dona Ana and northwestern El Paso Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 545 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chaparral, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chaparral, Anthony Gap and High Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin
